issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: KMSACLs#setKeyACLs, loads key ACLs from the configuration by checking if the key name contains "key.acl". However, this also matches "default.key.acl" and "whitelist.key.acl" which is incorrect.
fields.summary: KMS should skip default.key.acl and whitelist.key.acl when loading key acl

comments.body: Uploaded a simple patch to fix this issue.
Any comments? This is obviously an issue although it's not serious.

{color:red}-1 overall{color}.  Here are the results of testing the latest attachment 
  http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12690826/HADOOP-11469.001.patch
  against trunk revision d336d13.

    {color:green}+1 @author{color}.  The patch does not contain any @author tags.

    {color:red}-1 tests included{color}.  The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
                        Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
                        Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

    {color:green}+1 javac{color}.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

    {color:green}+1 javadoc{color}.  There were no new javadoc warning messages.

    {color:green}+1 eclipse:eclipse{color}.  The patch built with eclipse:eclipse.

    {color:green}+1 findbugs{color}.  The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 2.0.3) warnings.

    {color:green}+1 release audit{color}.  The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

    {color:green}+1 core tests{color}.  The patch passed unit tests in hadoop-common-project/hadoop-kms.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/5398//testReport/
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HADOOP-Build/5398//console

This message is automatically generated.

Hi [~dian.fu],

In general this looks good, but I think it would be good to add a unit test for this.

Charles
Hi [~clamb], thanks a lot for review and comments. Have added unit test and uploaded a new patch.

That's a nice simple test solution. The only nit I offer is that you could use a final for the conf and kmsACLs, but that's my own hang-up. +1 (non-binding).
Hi [~clamb], Nice advice, thanks very much. Have updated the patch according to your comments.

LGTM. +1 (non-binding)
Thanks [~clamb] for review. Could you help to commit this patch if you think it's OK?
I wish I could, but I'm not a real committer. I only play one on TV. (That's why my +1 was non-binding). [~hitliuyi], would you be able to help out here?
Thanks [~hitliuyi]] for review and comments. Have updated the patch according to your comments.

Thanks [~hitliuyi] for the comments. Agree with you that we should remove the suffix check, otherwise user will no longer receive the warning log if the a wrong operation is configured. Have updated the patch according to your comments. Thanks very much.
Updated the patch to remove unnecessary imports.
